title: [Large-scale] Blended Education Program for Strengthening Scientific Information Literacy Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic academic research skills, proficiency in fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Program for cultivating information evaluation and utilization skills for undergraduate science majors, combining online modules with spiral learning design via semester-based face-to-face workshops.

learning_goals: Students can identify credible scientific information with 90% accuracy.
Students can search for relevant materials on a research topic in academic databases using a three-step filtering strategy.
Students can accurately cite information sources according to APA Style guidelines.
Students can improve drafts of scientific reports at least twice by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
